DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE : TRAVEL AND TOURISM
DOC.TEXT: Hail to the Queen : The Queen Mary in Long_Beach is the site of a celebration this week to mark the 60th anniversary of the famed liner ' s christening.The festivities began Monday with a re-christening ceremony , complete with bagpipers and Prince Michael of Kent representing Britain ' s royal_family . The ship , which is now a floating tourist attraction in the Port of Long_Beach , has been weathering rough financial times . But Fullerton resident Joseph Prevratil , who led a consortium to take_over its operation last year , said that the ship has had a good summer season and that revenue is up .
